mapper.insert: INSERT INTO packageproduct(PID, ProductName, Theme, Area, o_file_name, s_file_name, StartTravelPeriod, Director, reDate, productcode, price) VALUES (#{pid}, #{productname}, #{theme}, #{area},#{o_file_name}, #{s_file_name}, #{starttravelperiod}, #{director}, #{redate}, #{productcode},#{price})
